channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- URL Shortener by MyThemeShop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- URL Shortener by MyThemeShop

item.title: CVE-2024-5802|2024-07-09T15:13:24.401Z -- unknown -- url%20shortener%20by%20mythemeshop
item.description: The URL Shortener by Myhop WordPress plugin through 1.0.17 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed

item.title: CVE-2024-5802|2024-07-09T06:00:04.751Z -- unknown -- url%20shortener%20by%20mythemeshop
item.description: The URL Shortener by Myhop WordPress plugin through 1.0.17 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
